imbibe.translation[0].definitions[0].def: to drink something, especially alcohol â€“ sometimes used humorously
imbibe.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: Both men imbibed considerable quantities of gin.
imbibe.translation[0].definitions[1].def: to accept and be influenced by qualities, ideas, values etc
imbibe.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: She had imbibed the traditions of her family.
